<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/1xfqqpIMq8w" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p>Does your docking ability need a boost? <strong>NavyFish</strong>'s <a href="http://bit.ly/14SVDxc"><strong>DOCKING PORT ALIGNMENT INDICATOR</strong></a> is the mod for you! Think of it as a manual docking companion. It adds heaps of data and targeting options that allow your ships (both new and existing) to dock with greater ease than ever before.</p>

<p>Get more info and download <strong>Docking Port Alignment Indicator</strong> <a href="http://bit.ly/14SVDxc"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.</p>

A deceptively tiny and simple mod... that I won't play without, because it perfectly hits the sweet spot of being an incredibly helpful tool without trivializing gameplay. A must-have, no questions asked.
